title: MotoGP 2016 Round 06 Mugello 720p 50fps Enhanced Audio
description:
This video is a RACE ONLY, but with an additional audio track I call "Enhanced". Enhanced means the bikes and ambient sounds have been boosted so you can actually hear them as well as the English commentary. The broadcasters obviously feel that it's all about the commentators and it's been getting worse every year. I played a video with standard audio track for someone and they asked me what was wrong with the sounds since they couldn't hear the motorcycles. 

I've enhanced the first part of the MotoGP season (thru Brno). If there is enough interest, I'll upload a few more. My Internet upload speed is pretty slow, so it takes a while to upload files of this size.

Enjoy!
